com.ibm.atp.auth
Class SharedSecret

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.atp.auth.ByteSequence
      com.ibm.atp.auth.SharedSecret
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
public final class SharedSecret
extends ByteSequence

The SharedSecret class is byte sequence for authentication. which is shared by individuals (agent, context, domain).

Version:
1.00 $Date: 2009/07/28 07:04:53 $
Author:
ONO Kouichi

Constructor Summary
private SharedSecret(java.lang.String domainName, java.security.cert.Certificate creatorCert)
          Constructor creates a secure random generator, and generate byte sequence as a shared secret (password) for authentication.
private SharedSecret(java.lang.String domainName, java.security.cert.Certificate creatorCert, java.lang.String secret, java.lang.String signature)
          Constructor creates byte sequence as a copy of given hexadecimal string of encoded bytes as a shared secret (password) for authentication.
